dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: Today's the day you've been waiting for..

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: yes, yes, it's here at last!

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: You must present it, your precious cheese! Yes, to THE ONE!

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: He awaits, oh yes, he does.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: And if he approves, oh, if he approves, he'll let us leave!

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: We'll be free, free from this wretched hell hole!

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: Ah, yes, yes! There's more you need to know, so much more! You can't carry the cheese by hand, oh no, no, no! It’s too precious, too delicate.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: But there is a way. Do you see it? The trolly! Yes, the old trolly! Rusty, creaky, but oh so useful.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: With that trolly, you can transport the cheese quickly, so quickly, to THE ONE.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: You can push, push with all your might! Glide through the halls, past the shadows, oh yes!

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: The trolly, the trolly, your only hope... Push it fast, push it silent... Escape this hell... escape...

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: We must offer... more... MORE! this just wont do..

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: Oh no, oh no, it's him. The abomination... the horror of both flesh and cheese... the Cheese Man

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: He’s a grotesque meld of flesh and cheese, a nightmare brought to life! His limbs... oh, they drip with the foul stench of spoiled dairy and rotting meat.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: He roams these halls with relentless hunger, sparing no one who possesses what he desires.. precious cheese..

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.line: Cursed luck, cursed luck! Of all the days, why today? The Cheese Man won't let you have it, won't let you present it to THE ONE. No, no, no! He'll chase you, devour you, and feast on your hopes and dreams, along with your precious cheese!
